justification: Misreads Team B’s needs and preferences. B has Adam Allen (Tier 2, ascending) and Jordan Walker (Tier 1, doubtful) at TE; Justin Wright (Tier 5, out, declining) is not an upgrade. Josh Garcia (rookie RB, friendly playoff schedule) fits B’s valued archetype and schedule focus, so moving him is unlikely. Rationale is brief and ignores injuries/tiers and B’s consensus-trusting behavior. Trade is feasible but poorly aligned with motivations.
